transcript:
Customer: Hello?

Executive: Hello?

Customer: Haan ji?

Executive: Sir namaskar Gaurav baat kar raha tha sir India mart se.

Customer: Bataye.

Executive: Sir wo aapka wo feedback diya tha na whatsapp pe to last time fir maine connect bhi kiya tha aapko aapne bataya sold out leads wala to maine aapko bataya tha I am interested karne ke liye to aapne kiya hua hai sir usse kuch benefit mila?

Customer: Haan haan maine kiya na.

Executive: Achcha to usse kuch benefits.

Customer: Haan benefit to.

Executive: Matlab leads ka matlab wahi hai ki ek do leads aana shuru hui main jaanna chah raha matlab balki ek do leads.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: To abhi shuru ho rahe achcha aaiye chaliye theek hai ek kaam kariye us par bas leads ko consume karke reply jarur kariyega us leads pe.

Customer: Haan haan main pura khud hi baith ke connect karta hu.

Executive: Achcha achcha chaliye theek hai aur aur to koi issue nahi aa raha hai na sir abhi matlab wo leads skills pe to main already team ko bhi bola hu kaam karne ke liye aur aapke end se wahi maine bola tha I am interested wala aap wo jarur kariyega.

Customer: Haan haan.

Executive: Theek hai aur ek ek cheez bas mujhe aap confirm kariye jaise apna ye wall painting advertising ka jo aapne rakha hua hai isme category to wall painting ki hai isme aapne ek digital wall painting rakha hua hai to isme ek hi product add hai aapka to isme koi similar aap product bata paye jo main isme add kar paun.

Customer: Ek minute ruk jao main digital painting wo ek khud product hai.

Executive: Achcha.

Customer: Khud ek product hai na.

Executive: Okay nahi nahi ek matlab category jaise isme category hamare paas hoti to category jo aapki yahan pe hai wo category aapki matlab us pe hai kya naam hai wall painting advertising but usme jo aapne product add kiya hai us category ke andar wo product aapka digital wall painting advertising service to wahi main bola isme kya hua keywords me jitne jyada product aap add kar payenge na usse by leads ka thoda flow badhta hai kyuki kya hota hai keywords to aapka ek hai but kuch log ho sakta hai isko painting advertising ke naam se search karte ho ya fir jaise ek aapne digital wall painting ke naam se ho gaya ho sakta hai kuch log wall painting ke hi naam se direct search karte ho usko digital nahi lagate ho to aap is tarah se agar product me aap add karenge na to wo us tarah se aapka flow badhega kyuki ho sakta hai ab aapne yahan pe dala hua wall painting are sorry digital wall painting but ho sakta hai yahan pe searches wall painting ke naam se jyada aa rahe digital se kam ho rahe ho to wo fir us tarah ka flow nahi badh pa raha hoga leads ka aapke paas to aap ek kaam ye jarur kariyega.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Ek bar apne matlab product me ya to aap ek bar free hoke aap batayega main Aniket aapke jo account manager unko bol dunga ek bar aapko video meet pe connect karke aapko ye category thodi proper kar denge ya fir aap batao to main bhi jab aap bologe main bhi connect kar lunga aapko ye correct karwa dunga aapka kyuki jaise aapka ye number whatsapp pe hai na aapka?

Customer: Haan ji haan ji.

Executive: Main aapko ek minute rukiye main aapko ek screenshot bhejta hu aap dekhiye isme category kyuki jo leads ka issue rehta hai na leads ko dekhiye jitni jyada se jyada add karenge usse hame benefit wahi milta hai ki hamare paas inquiries and by leads ka flow badh jata hai.

(silence)

Executive: Ye dekhiye main isko bheja hu.

(silence)

Executive: Ab ye isko ek bar aap open karenge dekhiye sab me ek hi ek product add hai minimum kam se kam teen teen product to add hone chahiye keywords me.

Executive: Jaise main aapko agar similar kisi aapke competitor ke dikhata hu ek minute rukiye.

(silence)

Executive: Abhi aapne open kiya image ko?

Customer: Kya keh rahe hain?

Executive: Aapne jo maine image bheja wo aapne open kiya usko?

Customer: Kya bheja?

Executive: Maine aapko whatsapp pe image bheja hua hai.

Customer: Haan haan ek minute.

Executive: Haan usme aap dekhiye single single add hai ab ab main aapko ek minute aapke local area kya lagta hai hapur uttar pradesh na sir?

Customer: Haan haan.

Executive: Ab yahan pe agar main baat karu to enterprise agar naam karwane ko kuch difference hai kya?

Customer: Kaise sir? Hapur ki jagah agar main Noida karwana chahu to isko?

Executive: Matlab Noida me aap bol rahe isko karana chah rahe hain?

Customer: Hmm.

Executive: Nahi nahi uske liye fir aapka rent agreement hona kyuki GST jahan ki hoti hai wahin ke address hum log dikhate hain.

Customer: Abhi jaise Noida rent agreement bhi hai aur mere paas yahan pe office bhi hai apna na.

Executive: Achcha ek kaam ek kaam karega aap mere ko main whatsapp pe ek bar bhejiyega main ek bar confirm to nahi bata paunga ek bar team ko dal dunga agar wo change karte hain to fir main karwa dunga.

Customer: Ab jaise ki aap ye category me aa rahi hai.

Executive: Haan aap rent agreement wagera bheje jaise maine aapko ek minute ab Noida ki aapne bataya main dekhiye Noida ki ek company aapko bhej raha hu aap dekhiyega inka inhone kya kiya ek keywords me panch panch che che product add kiye aur usse uske paas unke paas inquiries ka flow badh raha hai ye dekhiye.

(silence)

Executive: Inka aap open karenge dekhenge ek product me teen teen matlab product add kiya unhone ek category me.

(silence)

Executive: To isi tarah ka add karna hai ki at least hamare ek product me ek category me teen teen product ho to us naam se agar search kare to hamare paas by leads ka thoda flow direct by leads ka flow hamare paas aa jayega usse thoda increase ho jayega matlab ye hai mera kehna.

Customer: Theek hai aap add kara dijiye mujhe bhej ke.

Executive: Haan to wahi bola ek bar aap bataye video meet pe kab aa payenge main aapko dikha ke Aniket jo aapka account handle karte hain unke sath video meeting me connect karke aapka properly correct karwa dunga ye aap jab bataye aaj ya evening me free ho abhi free ho ya fir kal jab bataye main us correct karwa deta hu aapka ye sari cheeze hum log karte hain sirf isko ACB ki heading ko chod ke to ye aap add karwa dijiye usme.

Executive: Achcha ye aap jo maine kaun si company ki baat ki maine SK advertising ek bheja hua hai aapko aur ek maine aapko bheja hua hai.

Customer: Hum dono kaam karte dono ka kaam hai na hum log dono kaam karte hain sirf
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to increase buyleads.

- Customer wants to add more products.

- Customer wants to change address to Noida.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to add products.

- Executive offered video call to correct category.

- Executive asked to send rent agreement for address change.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will check about address change.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, product, category, address, gst
